title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Development Workshop for Medical School Students

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Within two weeks, learners can diagnose their learning habits using the Self-Regulated Learning Measurement Tool (SRMC) and write an analysis report
By the end of week 3, learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies across goal-setting, execution, and evaluation phases to math problem-solving, achieving over 80% accuracy
At the course’s conclusion, learners can create and present a personalized learning improvement plan incorporating peer feedback, earning over 4 points (out of 5) in peer evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
